data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: It's quite hard for me to think about an example of a competition I've entered as generally speaking, I am not a very competitive individual. However, I am going to tell you about one such contest that I participated in when I was a high school student. One day I came across an advertisement in our local newspaper that an inter-school mini-marathon competition would be held in two months' time. The entry fee was 20 Chinese yuan. I had a passion for running, so I registered. On the day of the contest, I firstly went to the entrance and signed in. I noticed there were around 60 competitors and I was asked to stand at my starting point. After hearing the sound of the whistle, I start running. The total distance was 13 kilometers. I had no intention of winning but was given a medal with my name on it as a participation award. (152字)
data.referenceText: Talk about competition or contest that you entered. When did it take place? And what did you have to do?
data.referenceTranslate: 谈谈你参加的比赛或竞技。它是什么时候发生的?你做了什么?
